pages.text: Supplementaries adds a variety of functional and decorative blocks to enhance your Minecraft world. $(br2)Explore the new items, tools, and contraptions that will bring more life to your builds.
Start by crafting handy tools like the Quiver for arrow storage, or the Bubble Blower for underwater breathing. $(br2)Decorate your builds with blocks like the Sign Post, Globe, and Clock Block.
Add functional items like the Spring Launcher to jump high, or the Redstone Relay to improve your automation setups. $(br2)Discover the full range of blocks and items in the Supplementaries mod!
